utterances.value: Good morning {{std.customer_name}}, I'd be happy to help you schedule an appointment with {{doctor_name}}. What time works best for you?

You're welcome, {{std.customer_name}}. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly for your new appointment. Remember to bring your insurance card and a list of any medications you're currently taking. We look forward to seeing you!
Sure thing! Here are the availabilities for Dr. Chen: {% for slots in utterance_field.availabilities %} {{slots}} {% endfor %}. Which one would you like to book?
